parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.03</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Opens or closes in-game map.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Warning </title><part><name index="1"/><value> If <tt>forced</tt> param is set to [[true]], when map is opened it cannot be closed manually and the user can get stuck requiring the game restart. Make sure you provide scripted mechanics to resolve this, should you need to force the map.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[openMap]] show </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> show: [[Boolean]] - if [[true]] opens map, if [[false]] closes map, provided it is not ''forced'' </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - equivalent of [[visibleMap]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[openMap]] [show, forced] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> show: [[Boolean]] - if [[true]] opens map, if [[false]] closes map, provided it is not ''forced''. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> forced: [[Boolean]] - if [[true]] keeps map from closing when map is open. </value></part><part><name>Parameter22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - equivalent of [[visibleMap]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[openMap]] [[true]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[openMap]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[forceMap]], [[forcedMap]], [[visibleMap]], [[showMap]], [[shownMap]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
